stanza.line: They that have power to hurt and will do none
That do not do the thing they most doshow
Who moving others are themselves as stone
They rightly do inherit heaven graces
And husband nature riches from expense
Tibey are the lords and owners of their faces
Others but stewards of their excellence
The summer flower is to the summersweet
Though to it self it only live and die
But if that flower with base infectionmeet
The basest weed outbraves his dignity
For sweetest things turn sourest by theirdeeds
Lilies that fester smell far worse thanweeds
